About

Hey I am Spooky ray author of spookyside.com . Spooky side is a collection of various paranormal/scary short stories.Many of the stories were anonymously published on the 4chan imageboards...

The site is under development every day so if you need to contact with us use the contact us form

“Sometimes the things in our heads are far worse than anything they could put in books or on film.” C.K. Webb
